name: House of number 76 Demo
description: A horror game. Nice atmosphere and good graphics. The game will scare you to the shivers. Full HD graphics. The plot of the game: the Wilson family is killed. You must find the killer and understand what is happening here ... We recommend that you put on headphones before playing in order to feel the atmospheric air. Good luck to you. Don't forget to rate the game) Control: WASD Run: Shift  Take some thing: E Inventory:  Tab Sit: C Turns: X Y Look at something: Q Pick up a flashlight: 1 2 Ful version:https://ek-game.itch.io/house-of-number-76aWorld championship GDWC 2021 Team:https://thegdwc.com/pages/game.php?game_guid=8eb32c2c-c05b-4c0d-8807-7732cda99d3...
